00015 enum priority_level { IDLE = 11,
00016                                LOWEST = 11,
00017                                BELOW_NORMAL = 11,
00018                                NORMAL = 11,
00019                                ABOVE_NORMAL = 11,
00020                                HIGHEST = 11,
00021                                TIME_CRITICAL = 11 };

00027     priority_level b_prio;

00046 public:

00049     virtual                   ~Thread(){};

00064     void                       T_Sleep(unsigned long millisecs);
00065 
00066 protected:
00067     virtual void               ThreadRoutine() = 0; // User overridden
00068     virtual void               onTerminate() = 0; // User overriden
